materials.raw_text:
1. Erbium Oxide (Er2O3) - 30 grams 
 2. Manganese Oxide (MnO2) - 120 grams 
 3. Scandium Oxide (Sc2O3) - 10 grams 
 4. Lithium Carbonate (Li2CO3) - 5 grams 
 5. Distilled Water - 50 mL (for slurry preparation) 
 6. Binder (Polyvinyl Alcohol, PVA) - 5 grams

preparation.raw_text:
1. In a clean mixing container, measure out 30 grams of Erbium Oxide, 120 grams of Manganese Oxide, and 10 grams of Scandium Oxide. 
 2. Add 5 grams of Lithium Carbonate to the mixture. 
 3. Slowly introduce 50 mL of distilled water to the powdered mixture while stirring continuously to form a slurry. 
 4. Incorporate 5 grams of Polyvinyl Alcohol into the slurry, ensuring it is well mixed and homogenous.
